directions: Seed and dice 10 tomato halves; transfer to large bowl. Place remaining tomatoes in blender; add onion, lime juice, chiles, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth. Add cilantro. Pulse just to mix in cilantro. Pour tomato puree into bowl with diced tomatoes. Stir to blend. Season salsa to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be made 4 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds plum tomatoes, cut in half
Pinch of freshly ground black pepper
1 cup (loosely packed) coarsely chopped fresh cilantro
title: Tomato, Onion, and Serrano Chile Salsa
